biotools.summary: FlorItaly is a data portal for the flora of Italy. This portal organises nomenclatural and distributional data from the recent checklists of the Italian native and alien vascular plants (and their subsequent updatings), with links to resources from other projects.

bioschemas.name: FlorItaly
